I tried the radio, playing musics & videos, it seem it works good, i do hope that Ruizu H1 would endure in long term, but i admire the delivery was fast, two tumbs up for seller...

This is the 2nd purchase from this store and 3rd for Ruizu's product. It looks like a high end item from appearance. It's not old stock ( though the date was set up on Feb 2020 ). Everything is work. But, It has no playlist feature, battery drains really fast ( charge once a day to use it half day ), quality audio for speaker and earphone is very lower than other 2 cheaper Ruizu. Setting up the equalizer doesn't help, but change the earphone to a higher quality is a bit better, also need earphone to listen radio and it gives delay response around 1-2 second with only couple songs in the storage. Ruizu needs to evaluate their products. The seller is very friendly with fast response and fast process, but again, no COD. Planning to try Benjie if only Indo's custom doesn't charge plenty TAXES, the price becomes heck higher. Thank you anyways.
